title: Add top-left creator credit and improve overall UI professionalism

requirements.text: Add a top-left corner credit label that reads exactly "Created By Arion Zi" in the top bar of the Hero section, aligned opposite the existing authentication controls.

quotes: Make this website more professional and in Top left corner Add Created By Arion Zi

acceptanceCriteria: On the landing (Hero) section, a visible text label "Created By Arion Zi" appears in the top-left area of the page.
The existing AuthControls remain accessible in the top-right area and keep their current behavior (sign in/out, focus management).
The credit label is readable on mobile and desktop, does not overlap other UI elements, and maintains the siteâ€™s existing dark/neon theme styling (subtle, professional).

requirements.text: Apply a UI polish pass to make the website look more professional by improving consistency of spacing, typography hierarchy, and alignment across major sections (Hero, Generator, Templates, Pricing, Examples, FAQ, Legal, Footer) without changing any existing feature behavior or gated-flow logic.
acceptanceCriteria: Section layouts use consistent max-widths and horizontal padding so content aligns cleanly between sections on desktop and mobile.
Headings/subheadings/body text have a more consistent hierarchy (sizes/weights/line-height), and the overall readability is improved without changing the meaning of existing user-facing text.
Cards, buttons, and link styles look consistent across sections (e.g., consistent radii, shadows, border treatments), while preserving the existing premium dark/neon visual identity.
No changes break existing flows: login/logout, plan selection, gated generator actions, generation outputs, copy/share, template selection, and card export all still work as before.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be modified: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, and anything under frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not introduce external API calls or dependencies that would reduce offline-friendliness.
Keep the current single-page structure and existing gated-flow logic intact.
nonGoals: Adding new generator features or changing the wish-generation logic/templates
Changing authentication provider (Internet Identity remains the only supported auth)

preferencesToAdd: Prefer a more professional visual polish across the site and a visible top-left creator credit: "Created By Arion Zi".
